Package org.forgerock.openam.saml2

Class UtilProxyCookieRedirector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.saml2.UtilProxyCookieRedirector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FederateCookieRedirector
    public class UtilProxyCookieRedirector
extends Object
implements FederateCookieRedirector
    A FederateCookieRedirector that uses the existing methods in Utility classes to implement cookie checking and redirect.
